Class Bond

All Implemented Interfaces:
CDKConstants
public class Bond
extends ElectronContainer

Implements the concept of a bond, i.e. a number of electrons connecting a number of atoms.

Field Summary
protected  Atom[] atoms
          A list of atoms participating in this bond
protected  int order
          The bond order of this bond
protected  int stereo
          A descriptor the stereochemical orientation of this bond.
